text: Adina Howard (November 14, 1973) is an American R&B; singer who was popular in the mid 1990s. She was extremely notable for her hit single "Freak Like Me", though there were other minor songs. She represented with a rather provocative image. Adina was born in Grand Rapids, Michigan. title: Adina Howard
